page.title: 14ILCHESTER BYPASS
page.content: An elderly resident said,"The bypass has stopped flooding of houses and neighbouring fields,but the traffic is quite heavy on the bypass (Approx.150 yrds from the end house) and could go through Yeovil instead,as a great deal of noise is produced for as long as 24 hours a day.The new road does not pass through Ilchester Mead thus preventing accidents.The new road may be fast but is a railway the answer?" {Housing Ilchester Mead is a small estate 80_100 years old with varying sizes of gardens and car parks.There are no shops.Ilchester is 750 yrds up the road.
